scripts.deploy-server: now deploy src/server | node -e "process.stdin.on('data', chunk => { var line = chunk.toString('utf8'); if(/Ready\!/.test(line)) process.stdout.write(line.match(/(https\:\S+)/)[0]+'/'); });" > SERVER_URI
scripts.build-client: cpx -C 'src/www/**/*.{html,png,jpg}' dist/www && browserify -t rollupify -t bubleify -t brfs -t uglifyify src/www/app.js -o dist/www/app.js
scripts.deploy-client-preprod: git add dist/www && git commit -m 'update dist/www' && echo 'dist/www changes committed' || echo 'no changes to dist/www' && git subtree push --prefix dist/www . gh-pages && git push origin gh-pages:gh-pages
